content.raw:
Could you be more specific on what's your setup and how you're trying to get the position? Depending on the tools you're using, this could be an issue with the specific ROS package you're using, not an issue on Gazebo.

If it isn't a bug in Gazebo, http://answers.gazebosim.org/ or http://answers.ros.org/ would be better places for this question.

Thanks
